ygData.subject: Re: Magician components?
ygData.msgSnippet: I decided to be an Erudite enchanter.  I am only at level 7 right now, and I m about to play to 8.  So far, I ve put almost all of my points into jewelmaking
ygData.messageBody:
I decided to be an Erudite enchanter. I am only at level 7 right now,
and I'm about to play to 8. So far, I've put almost all of my points
into jewelmaking (that I could) and the rest into 2H crush, for when
I get the runed totem staff. I've used fletching to supplement the
income that jewelmaking will take. Once I hit 8 and get enchant silver,
since I can already make the first three items with silver without
any failure (too easy for my skill class) methinks I can sell the
magic rings/bracers/necklace/etc for a few plat, then practice on the
higher level jewelery.

I've heard that words can also be used with enchanters, does anyone
have information on this? Plus, how are these items made? From
what I heard, the scraps/words/etc are placed into the main book that
your class gets, along with a quill and scroll (this is my guess),
combine, and if successful, a spell scroll like the ones bought in
the magic stores.

- Aeronis, Karana, DEF NEC; Aari, Karana, ERU ENC (among others)
